title: WTT: My T206 Flick no name - SOLD
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTT: My T206 Flick no name - SOLD
posts.post_content: Recently picked up this SGC 10 of HOF Flick with no name.  Looking to trade it for an SGC graded T206 displaying double name miscut.  Note that the white spot on the "C" in Cleveland is a hole that goes through to the back.
I'm also open to selling... one last try before hitting the bay on Sunday.
